changeSet.author: milicavulic
changeSet.sql: create sequence digital_signature_seq; create table if not exists digital_signature ( id bigint not null constraint digital_signature_pkey primary key, encrypted_private_key varchar(380), public_key varchar(268), initial_vector varchar(255), salt varchar(255), pass_length int, auth_id bigint constraint digital_signature_fk_on_auth references auth );
